section.title: Download the Google Play services
section.para:
Open the Android SDK Manager and install
Extras Google Play services

section.title: Create an library project for the Google Play Service library
section.para:
The Android SDK manager downloads the file to sdk/extras/google/google_play_services/libproject/google-play-services_lib
.

Import the library from there into Eclipse via the
File Import Android Existing Android Code into Workspace
menu entry.

textobject.phrase: Importing Google services as Android library projec

section.para: To use this library define a library dependency in your Android project.
